See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SL * Contributions are Copyright (C) 1999-2005 Openbravo, S.L ************************************************************************* * $Id: AD_PInstance_Trg.sql,v 1.1 2002/01/20 20:53:58 jjanke Exp $ *** * Title: Update Process Statistics * Description: ************************************************************************/ v_Seconds NUMBER; BEGIN IF(:old.IsProcessing='Y' AND :new.IsProcessing='N') THEN -- Calculate Seconds v_Seconds :=(:new.Updated-:new.Created) * 86400; -- 24*60*60 IF(v_Seconds=0) THEN v_Seconds:=1; END IF; UPDATE AD_Process SET Statistic_Count=COALESCE(Statistic_Count, 0) + 1, Statistic_Seconds=COALESCE(Statistic_Seconds, 0) + v_Seconds WHERE AD_Process_ID=:new.AD_Process_ID; END IF; END AD_PInstance_Trg
